description_txt: stated on April 7, 2019 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Says John Wayne said, "If you don’t want an American flag flying in your town square or at your school, then why the hell are you living in the US?"

description_txt: stated on June 7, 2019 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Says Michael Bloomberg said, "I have known Trump for decades. We have traveled in the same business circles. He is known among millionaires as a con-artist and among business owners as a cheat out to stiff everyone."

description_txt: stated on May 26, 2019 in a TV interview:
quote_txt: "Just the last three weeks, on average about 23,000 women, children, men are coming over across the border illegally as family units or as unaccompanied children."

description_txt: stated on June 10, 2019 in a tweet:
quote_txt: Says that in New Mexico, "illegals are issued emergency welfare EBT cards with $1k a month +$200 for each child, for at least 5+ years until they see a judge."

description_txt: stated on June 4, 2019 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Says a photo taken in England shows "thousands of English Trump supporters" celebrating the president’s visit.

description_txt: stated on June 3, 2019 in a radio interview:
quote_txt: "There are parts of I-80 near Joliet that school buses are not allowed to cross because of the fragile nature of a bridge."

description_txt: stated on May 31, 2019 in in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Said Dan McCready "got nearly $1 million in support from a Nancy Pelosi aligned dark money org in the 2018 election cycle right after he tweeted, ‘Dark money has no place in our politics’."

description_txt: stated on June 11, 2019 in a campaign speech:
quote_txt: "In the Obama-Biden administration, we got China to cut cyber-theft -- it's gotten significantly worse under this administration."

description_txt: stated on May 26, 2019 in a TV interview:
quote_txt: "Most research shows that (UW salaries) are a little behind, and (in) some areas we're behind more than others."

description_txt: stated on June 7, 2019 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Says singer Charlie Daniels said, "voting for Trump is like playing country music backwards … you get your house back, your car back, your job back, your country back!"

description_txt: stated on June 7, 2019 in a tweet:
quote_txt: "Millions of Americans need mental health care. Yet in Iowa, there are just 64 public mental health care beds. And you see similar numbers across the country."

description_txt: stated on June 6, 2019 in on "Jimmy Kimmel Live":
quote_txt: "Richard Nixon was the last president to be impeached."

description_txt: stated on May 28, 2019 in a press release:
quote_txt: "It’s estimated that in 2018 alone, dead people received $1 billion in benefits from Medicare, Medicaid, social security payments, and federal pensions."

description_txt: stated on June 10, 2019 in a post on the Internet:
quote_txt: "Disease-ridden" migrants from parts of Africa with Ebola are being "dumped in San Antonio."

description_txt: stated on June 7, 2019 in a Instagram post:
quote_txt: A video of Mark Zuckerberg shows him talking about controlling "billions of people’s stolen data" to control the future.

description_txt: stated on June 6, 2019 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Says a viral photo shows Susan B. Anthony being "beaten and arrested for trying to vote" in 1872.

description_txt: stated on June 5, 2019 in a tweet:
quote_txt: "Every day on average 500 people die from gun violence."

description_txt: stated on May 29, 2019 in a radio interview.:
quote_txt: "The e-cigarette vaping phenomenon has wiped out all the progress we’ve made on reducing youth smoking."

description_txt: stated on June 9, 2019 in in a tweet:
quote_txt: "Turns out the critics of the Texas maternal mortality rate were just lying. It’s less than half of what the critics said. It’s about 1/10 of 1%."

description_txt: stated on May 29, 2019 in a tweet:
quote_txt:
Republicans on the budget-writing committee "did nothing" to address oversight of
large-scale farms, "as literal manure is coming out of people’s faucets.

description_txt: stated on June 6, 2019 in a tweet:
quote_txt: "I have consistently voted against the Hyde Amendment."

description_txt: stated on May 17, 2019 in an interview:
quote_txt: "We’ve lifted hundreds of thousands of people out of poverty in the last five years."

description_txt: stated on May 5, 2019 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Says six eradicated diseases such as whooping cough and the bubonic plague are making a comeback "thanks to refugees and illegal immigrants."

description_txt: stated on May 29, 2019 in a television appearance:
quote_txt: "For more than a year, I have been saying that it’s time for Congress to act and begin impeachment proceedings."

description_txt: stated on June 4, 2019 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Says Donald Trump is the first sitting U.S. president in 56 years to not attend a wreath-laying ceremony on Veterans Day.

description_txt: stated on June 1, 2019 in a speech at the California Democratic Party Convention:
quote_txt: President Trump’s tariffs are "taking $1.4 billion out of working people’s pockets every month."

description_txt: stated on May 30, 2019 in a TV interview:
quote_txt: Says there were "rumors floating around" that Chicago police union officials were "telling their officers, ‘don’t do anything. Over Memorial Day weekend, don’t intercede. If you see some criminal activity, just lay back, do nothing.’"

description_txt: stated on June 6, 2019 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: "In 1921, early suffragettes often donned a bathing suit and ate pizza in large groups to annoy men…it was a custom at the time."

description_txt: stated on June 3, 2019 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Says swabbing a tick with a soap-soaked cotton ball is a "safe, easy way" to remove them from skin.

description_txt: stated on June 6, 2019 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Says Kanye West scored "106 points against wheelchair basketball team."
